item.title: Justin Fields won't get benched? Myles Garrett is DPOY? Let's overreact to Week 8
item.description: We sized up Week 8 overreactions, including fantasy. Is Fields on more solid ground? Will Garrett be the DPOY?

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Vinícius Júnior eyes Real Madrid exit in January
item.description: Real Madrid forward Vinícius Júnior could seek an exit in the January transfer window. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Passan: 18 innings, 11 runs, a walk-off homer -- and an epic Game 3
item.description: The Dodgers won an instant classic featuring plenty of drama and more history from Shohei Ohtani.

item.title: Dodgers win WS classic on Freeman's HR in 18th
item.description: Freddie Freeman once again lifted the Dodgers with a walk-off home run in a World Series, this time in the 18th inning of Game 3 against the Blue Jays...

item.title: Springer exits with injury; Jays await MRI results
item.description: Blue Jays designated hitter George Springer left Game 3 of the World Series after suffering an injury on a swing in the top of the seventh inning Mond...
